name: Krieg DR-460N
description:
Created for the Bullet Hell Game Jam 2021

Sometimes the tutorial breaks the game. If you are unable to play the game, don't click skip or click the screen. Only leave it there and enjoy the cinematic. If the problem persists, restart the gam. Or disable it by going to options -> show tutorial and uncheck the toggle.

Sometimes the big blue tank won´t attack. There is nothing you can do about it, maybe restart and have luck. 
I´m sorry if any bug you encounter ruins your experience. We are trying to fix them as fast as possible. An updated version will be released when the Jam is over.
